word.definition: a suggestion about what sb should do, especially from an expert

word.definition: costing little money

word.definition: a thing that make it easier to relax and have a pleasant time

word.definition: a situation in which companies compete with each other to try and get sth
word.example: There was intense competition for the contract.

word.definition: a company that is competing against others in business
word.example: They claim to be 10% cheaper than their closest competitor.

word.definition: an amount of money that is taken off the usual cost of sth

word.definition: costing a lot of money

word.definition: buildings, services, equipment, etc. that are provided for a purpose

word.definition: moving or happening quickly

word.definition: of a good standard compared to others

word.definition: costing little money

word.definition: very large or important

word.definition: a group of possible customers who are similar in income, interests, etc.

word.definition: a particular design or type of product
